long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Domain History Cleaner helps you take control of your browsing history by automatically removing visits to blacklisted domains of your choice. It ensures sensitive domains won't clutter your history or appear in the address bar's auto-suggestions of your browser.

BLACKLIST THE DOMAINS OF YOUR CHOICE
Automatically remove visits to specific domains from your browsing history.

NO AWKWARD AUTO-SUGGESTION APPEARANCES
Prevent blacklisted domains from appearing in the address bar when typing.

EASY MANAGEMENT
Add or remove domains directly from the options panel or with a right-click menu.

PRIVACY FIRST
The blacklist is stored locally in your browser and is never shared with third parties.

BACKUP & RESTORE
Save your blacklist and reload it when needed with import/export options.
